text: Ossie Davis (born Raiford Chatman Davis; 18 December 1917 – 4 February 2005) was an American movie, television and Broadway actor, director, poet, playwright, author, and social activist.Ossie Davis – Awards IMDB. 2012. Retrieved March 17, 2012Ossie Davis Television Credits Official Website of Ossie Davis & Ruby Dee. 2012. Retrieved March 17, 2012Books Official Website of Ossie Davis & Ruby Dee. 2012. Retrieved March 17, 2012 He was known for his role as Yar in the 2000 animated movie Dinosaur. He was married to actress Ruby Dee. Davis died in Miami, Florida from heart disease, aged 87. == Filmography == * No Way Out (1950) as John Brooks (uncredited) * Fourteen Hours (1951) as Cab Driver (uncredited) * The Joe Louis Story (1953) as Bob (uncredited) * Gone Are the Days!
